longBusinessSummary: JFE Systems, Inc. provides engages in the planning, designing, developing, operating, and maintenance of information systems in Japan. It also offers business solutions, such as ERP, supply chain management systems, BI systems, cost management systems, procurement management systems, e-commerce, system coordination, digital form systems, and quality information management and manufacturing method management systems for the food industry. In addition, the company provides infrastructure solutions, which include cloud and server virtualization, information security support, emergency earthquake alert, voice-based cloud, LAN construction, and help desk services; office solutions, manufacturing site solutions, and platform development support services; systems development and maintenance in sales, production/logistics, accounting, costs, procurement, demand/supply, quality, accounts, annuities, and credit cards. JFE Systems, Inc. was formerly known as Kawasaki Steel Systems R&D Corporation and changed its name to JFE Systems, Inc. in 2004. The company was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan. JFE Systems, Inc. is a subsidiary of JFE Steel Corporation.
